H0.text: Who presented Family Fortunes in the two years between Bob Monkhouse and Les Dennis. Bruce Forsyth

H1.text: Who presented Family Fortunes in the two years between Bob Monkhouse and Les Dennis. Larry Grayson

H2.text: Who presented Family Fortunes in the two years between Bob Monkhouse and Les Dennis. Jim Davidson

H3.text: Who presented Family Fortunes in the two years between Bob Monkhouse and Les Dennis. Max Bygraves

A4.text: Davidson became known for Big Break (1991–2002) and as the third host of The Generation Game (1995–2002), as the successor to Bruce Forsyth and Larry Grayson.
